solution_line_template: The two daughters' haircuts cost ${children_haircut_cost} x {num_daughters} = $<<{children_haircut_cost}*{num_daughters}={daughters_total_cost}>>{daughters_total_cost}.
The tip on the haircuts is ${total_haircut_cost} x {tip_percent_num}% = $<<{total_haircut_cost}*{tip_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={tip_amount}>>{tip_amount}.
